Quick Start¶

Command line¶

$ pip3 install sdvalidator
$ sdvalidate csbaird.com
VALID

Script¶

test.py:

from sdvalidator import *
domains = ['csbaird.com','google.com','github.com']
cache = validate_sd(domains,verbose=True)
print(cache['csbaird.com']['spf_validity']) # VALID

$ python3 test.py
VALID
